markAsNothingToDoButton.studentsTurn:
**Functional Purpose**: Tooltip content explaining the purpose of the 'It's the student's turn' button.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Discussion page (on hover over the 'It's the student's turn' button)
**When Users See This**: When hovering over the button to mark a discussion as nothing to do.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "This button allows you to remove this discussion from your Inbox and return it to the student's Inbox. Use it when it's the student's turn but the system incorrectly thinks its yours."
markAsNothingToDoButton.itsTheStudentsTu:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to indicate that the discussion is now the student's turn.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Discussion page (button label)
**When Users See This**: When a mentor wants to mark a discussion as the student's turn.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "It's the student's turn…"
markAsNothingToDoButton.passDiscussionBa:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the confirmation modal to pass the discussion back to the student.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Discussion page (Confirmation Modal header)
**When Users See This**: When a mentor clicks the 'It's the student's turn' button and the confirmation modal opens.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Pass this discussion back to the student?"
markAsNothingToDoButton.continuingWillRe:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text in the confirmation modal about the action's consequences.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Discussion page (Confirmation Modal body text)
**When Users See This**: When a mentor opens the confirmation modal to pass the discussion back.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Continuing will remove this from your Inbox and return it to the student's Inbox. This feature is intended for when a student has left a message for you such as "Sure, I'll do that" and the system now needs to be told it's still the student's turn to act."
markAsNothingToDoButton.addCommentToDisc:
**Functional Purpose**: Important advice in the confirmation modal regarding communication with the student.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Discussion page (Confirmation Modal body text)
**When Users See This**: When a mentor opens the confirmation modal to pass the discussion back.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "If it may not be clear to the student that it's their turn to act, please add a comment to the discussion in addition to using this button."
markAsNothingToDoButton.continue:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to confirm and proceed with passing the discussion back.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Discussion page (Confirmation Modal primary button)
**When Users See This**: When a mentor is in the confirmation modal and wants to proceed.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Continue"
markAsNothingToDoButton.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to cancel the action and close the modal.
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Discussion page (Confirmation Modal secondary button)
**When Users See This**: When a mentor is in the confirmation modal and wants to cancel.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Cancel"
